name: Mochi Prince
description:
Mochi kingdom is in danger! Eternal winter is on its way! Guide Prince Mochi and help him bring back warmth to the kingdom!

Controls:
Press "A" to move left
Press "D" to move right
Press "SPACE" to jump
Right Click to Dash
Left Click to Attack
Press "E" to use skill. Skill is only available during Boss Stage.

Detailed How to Play soon! Since this game is still working on progress, feel free to leave a suggestion on the comments below.
